name: Star Wars Opening Crawl Generator
description:
A long time ago, but still before the Boomer Generation...

Make your own Star Wars Opening Crawl with this silly but simple piece of software. This is not high art (I made it in an evening) but hopefully it might give you a mildly entertaining diversion for a few minutes. Feel free to share your story prologues with me!

Made in Unity. No copyright infringement is intended.

Website: www.persephoneschair.com

Twitter: www.twitter.com/PersephoneChair

Discord: http://discord.gg/persephoneschair
